title: Participant — MBCC 2025
description: Participated in the Mind, Brain, and Consciousness Conference 2025 (MBCC 2025) at Indian Institute of Technology Mandi (IIT Mandi) during 4-7 June 2025. The conference was organised by the Centre for Indian Knowledge Systems & Mental Health Applications (IKSMHA) and brought together neuroscience, AI, Indian philosophy and IKS research. My paper titled “AI Tongue Diagnosis: Expert System with LLMs for Abdominal Disease Detection through Mobile App” was presented, exploring IKS-based health diagnostics, gaining exposure to IKS-informed project ideas and interdisciplinary research bridges.

title: Participant & Volunteer — Faith & Future: Integrating AI with Spirituality Conference 2025
description: Participated in the international conference Faith & Future: Integrating AI with Spirituality at Dev Sanskriti Vishwavidyalaya (DSVV), Haridwar (16-17 Sept 2025). The event focussed on aligning AI development with spiritual, cultural and ethical values. I presented the paper “The Spiritual Well-being Index (SWBI): An AI Framework for Measuring and Enhancing Spiritual Growth”. Additionally, I participated in the 24-hour hackathon organised by the Institute of Artificial Intelligence, Dev Sanskriti Vishwavidyalaya (IAI DSVV) contributing backend development for a web-based learning platform and won the hackathon.

title: Hackathon Winner — Institute of Artificial Intelligence, DSVV
description: Participated and won the 24-hour Hackathon organized by the Institute of Artificial Intelligence, Dev Sanskriti Vishwavidyalaya (DSVV), Haridwar. Collaborated with a multidisciplinary team to develop a web-based learning platform aimed at enhancing student engagement and AI-assisted education. My primary contribution was designing and implementing the backend architecture, including API development, database integration, and user authentication modules, ensuring scalability and real-time performance.

title: Participated in Greenovation Ideathon — ICFAI University, Dehradun 2024
role: Pitching AI-based Solution for Circular Economy
description: Participated in the Greenovation event held at ICFAI University, Dehradun (August 8-9, 2024). The hackathon brought together students and startups working on sustainability challenges including circular economy, clean tech and waste-management. Collaborated with a multidisciplinary team to conceive and pitch an AI-driven platform that enables efficient resource recovery and waste-to-value cycles. My primary contributions included researching existing circular-economy frameworks, selecting appropriate AI/ML models for material stream classification, designing the architecture of the solution including data-ingestion modules, and preparing the team’s pitch presentation to the jury.

title: Social_Internship – Youth & Spirituality Outreach, Surat
description: Completed a one-month Social_Internship in Surat at the ‘City of India’ initiative, delivering lectures across various departments — Biotechnology, M.Com, Hindu Studies, IAS Training, Management, Technology (Computer Science/Data Science), BSc Physics/Chemistry, Mathematics — as well as conducting yoga sessions at Vastalaya Dham (an orphanage). Topics covered included personality development, youth challenges with solutions via spirituality, pillars of spirituality, stress management, benefit of the Gayatri mantra, and practical guidance for today’s students.
